headlines.title: Sony is hiring to expand "PlayStation Studios games beyond PlayStation hardware" — partners including Xbox, Steam, Nintendo Switch, and more - Windows Central
headlines.summary: Sony is following Microsoft's multiplatform strategy, looking to acquire a bigger third-party publishing footprint across PC and even rival consoles.

headlines.title: You can now easily buy a Switch 2 without jumping through hoops - The Verge
